title: Tell me about your apartment. What does it look like?

korean: 우리 집은 투룸 아파트인데, 혼자 살기엔 딱 적당한 크기야.
현관 들어가면 바로 거실이 나오는데, 햇빛이 잘 들어와서 좋아.
거실에 작은 소파랑 테이블 하나 놓으니까 딱 꽉 차더라고.
창문이 남향이라 낮에는 조명 켤 필요가 없어, 전기세 아끼는 중.
주방은 오픈형이라 요리하면서 TV 볼 수 있어서 편해.
싱크대가 좀 작긴 한데, 설거지는 바로바로 하는 편이라 괜찮아.
방은 침실하고 작은 방 하나 더 있는데, 작은 방은 옷방으로 쓰고 있어.
침실에 침대랑 책상 놓으니까 딱 좋은데, 옷장은 못 들어가서 아쉬워.
화장실은 좁지만 깨끗하게 유지하려고 노력하는 중이야.
베란ダ가 작긴 한데, 빨래 널기엔 충분해.
가끔 베란다에서 커피 마시면서 밖 구경하는 게 소소한 낙이야.
전체적으로 아늑하고 관리하기 편해서 만족하면서 살고 있어.
english: Well, my place is, like, a two-room apartment, and you know, it's just the right size for living alone.
So when you enter through the front door, you see the living room right away, and I mean, I love how much sunlight comes in.
When I put a small sofa and a table in the living room, it, like, filled up perfectly.
The window faces south, so, you know, I don't really need to turn on the lights during the day, which is great for saving on electricity.
The kitchen is, um, open-style, so I can actually watch TV while cooking, which is super convenient.
The sink is a bit small, but, well, I wash dishes right away, so it's fine.
There are two rooms, you know, a bedroom and a smaller room, and I use the smaller one as, like, a closet room.
The bedroom fits a bed and desk perfectly, but unfortunately, you know, there's no space for a wardrobe.
The bathroom is kind of small, but I'm trying to keep it clean.
The balcony is, like, tiny, but it's enough for hanging laundry.
Sometimes I enjoy my coffee on the balcony while looking outside, and, I mean, it's a small pleasure.
Overall, it's pretty cozy and easy to manage, so, you know, I'm living here quite contentedly.
